table.name: civicrm_report_instance
table.comment: Users can save their report instance and put in a cron tab etc.

field.name: id
field.title: Report Instance ID
field.comment: Report Instance ID

field.name: domain_id
field.title: Report Instance Domain ID
field.comment: Which Domain is this instance for

field.name: title
field.title: Report Instance Title
field.comment: Report Instance Title.

field.name: report_id
field.title: Report template ID
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value for the report template

field.name: name
field.title: Report instance Name
field.comment: when combined with report_id/template uniquely identifies the instance

field.name: args
field.title: Report Instance Arguments
field.comment: arguments that are passed in the url when invoking the instance

field.name: description
field.title: Report Instance description
field.comment: Report Instance description.

field.name: permission
field.title: Report Instance Permissions
field.comment: permission required to be able to run this instance

field.name: grouprole
field.title: Report Instance Assigned to Roles
field.comment: role required to be able to run this instance

field.name: form_values
field.title: Submitted Form Values
field.comment: Submitted form values for this report

field.name: is_active
field.title: Report Instance is Active
field.comment: Is this entry active?

field.name: created_id
field.title: Report Instance Created By
field.comment: FK to contact table.

field.name: owner_id
field.title: Report Instance Owned By
field.comment: FK to contact table.

field.name: email_subject
field.title: Report Instance email Subject
field.comment: Subject of email

field.name: email_to
field.title: Email Report Instance To
field.comment: comma-separated list of email addresses to send the report to

field.name: email_cc
field.title: cc Email Report Instance To
field.comment: comma-separated list of email addresses to send the report to

field.name: header
field.title: Report Instance Header
field.comment: comma-separated list of email addresses to send the report to

field.name: footer
field.title: Report Instance Footer
field.comment: comma-separated list of email addresses to send the report to

field.name: navigation_id
field.title: Navigation ID
field.comment: FK to navigation ID

field.name: drilldown_id
field.title: Drilldown Report ID
field.comment: FK to instance ID drilldown to
